DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read your oganization's custom authentication extensions
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's custom authentication extensions on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read your organization's custom authentication extensions
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's custom authentication extensions on your behalf.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's custom authentication extensions without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's custom authentication extensions
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read or write your organization's custom authentication extensions on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write your organization's custom authentication extensions
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read or write your organization's custom authentication extensions on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all custom authentication extensions
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read or write your organization's custom authentication extensions without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Receive custom authentication extension HTTP requests
Application.adminDescription: Allows custom authentication extensions associated with the app to receive HTTP requests triggered by an authentication event. The request can include information about a user, client and resource service principals, and other information about the authentication.
